item.title: Recurse Center: Week 2
item.description: LDN -> NYC The Recurse Center is based in New York and pre-Covid all attendance was in person at its office space, the ‘Hub’, in Brooklyn. Since the pandemic physical attendance has been optional, but given that a lot of the value of RC is the connections you make and the ideas you share, I wanted to attend in person. Circumstances meant I was still at home in London for week 1, but the big thing for me in week 2 was I arrived in New York.

item.title: Recurse Center: Week 1
item.description: Wello, horld! Earlier this month I decided to leave my job and spend a few weeks at the Recurse Center, working on my programming skills and taking time to think about what I’d like to do next. Participants aren’t required to write a blog about their time here, but it is a great way to document what you’ve been doing in this busy period, for your future self if nobody else.
